title: Theosophy - talks, readings and lectures (Mumbai - Part 1 of 2)
description: Audio podcasts (in a mixture of mp3 and wma format) of talks given at Mumbai Lodge of the ULT (United Lodge of Theosophists), on various philosophical and metaphysical subjects. See below for the titles of these talks. This collection of audio files was complete as of the 26th November 2017, but there will likely be new podcasts made available after this date, which can be found on the website of Mumbai (and Bengaluru) branches of the ULT at: http://www.ultindia.org/index.html by clicking on the 'lectures' tab. Enjoy, and please consider sharing if you know anyone who might benefit from this profound and timeless wisdom. Please be aware the audio quality of some of these files is not perfect. In most cases it's clear and listenable, but in some cases there's some heavy room echo and hiss from the device used to record the audio. After Death What? Are we bound by fate? Instinct Intellect Intuition Karma and Heredity Why are we here? Understanding Krishna and Krishna Jayanti Conquest of Fear Character and Spiritual Integrity Victory Over Evil - Celebrating Dasara Inner Significance of Rituals and Ceremonies Stop Thinking - Start Being Is Karma Just and Merciful (2011-07) Miracles of Faith and Will (2011-09) Death Is Not The End Alchemy of Happiness Can the Dead Communicate Paying Our Karmic Debts You Are Not Alone Sorrow and Its Significance When the Disciple is Ready the Guru Appears Does Life Have a Purpose Do Dreams Have a Message Character and Spiritual Integrity Peace and Goodwill to All Cycles in Nature and in Man After Death - What? Creative Power of Speech Man - Risen Ape or Fallen Angel Hidden Powers in Man Man - The Creator Healthy Mind in a Healthy Body Astrology - Science or Fraud Altruism And Self Development Ambition And Spiritual Life Alchemy Science of Self Realization Are We Bound By Fate Brotherhood of Religions Buddha Dhamma and Poetry Building Of Character Can Man Know God Charity Mortification Sacrifice Confucious And His Teachings Death is not the end Divine Messengers of Humanity Do Dreams Have A Message Do Myth Have Meaning Education For Better Living Evolution Blind or Intelligent Evolution - Physical, Intellectual, Spiritual God And Gods God Prayer Forgiveness Going for Refuge Have We Lived Before Health For The Whole Man Helping Suffering Humanity How Should We Begin The Year 2000 Independance and Interdependance Is Karma Just and Merciful Is Psychism Dangerous Jainism - A Way of Life Laws of Health and Healing Laws Of Spiritual Success Life - A Drama, A School, A Pilgrimage
